assessments.status_rationale: The October ISM Manufacturing PMI has not been released yet (due by 2025-11-01), and today's news does not report a result.
The October U.S. unemployment rate is scheduled for 2025-11-07; no outcome is referenced in today’s coverage.
The early-November 2025 RBA decision has not occurred yet; no definitive reporting today.
No article indicates the Nikkei 225 has reached 52,000; deadline remains in the future.
No report today of a new North Korean ballistic missile launch acknowledged by South Korea’s JCS or Japan’s MOD.
Coverage mentions market volatility around earnings and the Fed but does not confirm a ≥2.0% S&P 500 up day; deadline has not passed.
No FX level for USD/JPY is cited today; cannot verify whether 153.50 has been traded within the window.
October Advance Retail Sales ex-auto is due mid-November; no result reported yet.
The September S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller 20-City YoY print is due late November; no data today.
No mention of the ICE BofA MOVE Index level; cannot confirm a ≥115 close before the 2025-11-30 deadline.
